name: Typhoon (Triotech Amusement)
overview: The Typhoon is the quintessential coin-op, media-based simulator ride. Sit side-by-side and experience a ride like never before. A top quality experience, combined with motion seats and wind, will leave guests craving for more! The 10th anniversary edition underlines this unique milestone with a brand-new attractive look, a 4K resolution screen, as well as a new 10-film selection for an exciting immersive experience.
